boardgame.name: Blokus Trigon
בלוקוס טריגון
ブロックス トライゴン
boardgame.description: Blokus Trigon is an abstract strategy game from the makers of Blokus. The board pieces have changed from square to triangular. Game play is similar to Blokus, as players try to get rid of all their pieces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There is a solitaire version where one player tries to get rid of all the pieces in a single sitting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Components:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Hexagonal playing board with 486 triangles on the board_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4 sets of 22 pieces in red, blue, green and yellow_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 piece made up of one triangle._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 piece made up of two triangles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 piece made up of three triangles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 3 pieces made up of four triangles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 pieces made up of five triangles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 12 pieces made up of six triangles._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Set up:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Layout your hexagonal silver board and give each player a set of 22 pieces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Play:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each player begins at one of the marked spaces on the board. The order of play is blue, yellow, red, green colours. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As the play progresses, each new piece is placed on the board. The new piece placed must touch another piece of the same colour, and it can only touch corner-to-corner or corner-to-edge. The constraint is that a piece can never touch another piece of the same colour edge-to-edge._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;When a player cannot place any more pieces on the board (either because they are blocked and can't fit any more, or because they have already placed all of their pieces), they must drop out of the game. The other players continue until no one is able to place any more pieces on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Scoring:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;At the end of the game, each player must count the number of triangles that they were unable to place on the trigon board, and calculates their score as follows:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Each triangle that is not placed on the board counts as a negative point._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 15 points are awarded as a bonus, if the player has all 22 pieces placed on the board._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; This bonus increases to 20 points if the 22 pieces were placed on the board with the single triangle piece being placed last._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players can choose to play multiple rounds and keep a running tally of the scores. The winner is the person with the maximum points!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2006 Japan Boardgame Prize Best Japanese Game Nominee
2008 JoTa Best Abstract Board Game Nominee

Played once. Mint condition. For ages 7 and up. You can learn this game in 20 minutes. Place pieces of your color on board touch each other. Try to take over as much of the board as you can to block your opponents. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a race. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a puzzle. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s fun!
Brand New!! Still in shrinkwrap. Will ship internationally. Educational Insights (EDI 2970)

Educational Insights (EIS 2970) For those who can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t get enough of Blokus! It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;chip off the ole Blokus,_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; but with a super-challenging twist! A new dimension of triangular-created Trigon pieces must be fit, tip to tip with your own pieces, on the hexagonal game board. Angles jut in every direction, so new strategies are always evolving. It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s the Bermuda Triangles (486 in all) of strategy games. Think carefully! You can block-and be blocked-at any moment! Quick to learn, challenging to master. Includes recessed game board, 88 Trigon pieces in four bright translucent colors, and guide. For 2-4 players. Grades K and up.
Mint _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Sealed

Educational Insights (EIS 2970) Blokus Trigon is an abstract strategy game from the makers of Blokus. The board pieces have changed from square to triagonal. Game play is similar to Blokus, as players try to get rid of all their pieces. The only caveat to placing a piece is that it may not lie adjacent to your other pieces, but instead must be placed touching at least one of your pieces already on the board at a corner. There is a solitaire version where one player tries to get rid of all the pieces in a single sitting.
